channel.title: Hekuran RSS
channel.description: Updates from Hekuran. Throw this in your RSS feeder for instant updates!

item.title: First bloatpost
item.description:
Im (probabily) very rarely gonna post, but this is just a statement for the normies using social-media.

This is the independent way, the way it was meant to be, to use the www.

Btw, this blog system was 100% copyed from luke's blog: "lb"
